title: CLI Data Viz Quickstart
description: Turn CSV/JSON into quick charts from the command line; export PNG/SVG for reports.
author: claudepro
content:
# CLI Data Visualization Quickstart

Generate charts from local data in minutes, suitable for quick analyses and reports.

## Key Operations
- CSV/JSON ingestion
- Chart templates
- Headless rendering
- PNG/SVG export

examples.title: Bar chart from CSV (Python)
examples.code:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv('data.csv')
df.groupby('category')['value'].sum().plot(kind='bar')
plt.tight_layout(); plt.savefig('chart.png', dpi=200)

steps: For Node: npm i vega vega-lite

troubleshooting.solution: Install system fonts or specify a font path for rendering.
